en.title: Fusion Excel's Medical Consultant and Speaker: Dr. Amir Farid Isahak.
en.content:
DR AMIR FARID ISAHAK [ MBBS (Qld,Aust), MMED (Spore), MRCOG (UK) ] is a senior medical consultant/gynecologist with nearly 30 years of practicing. In Malaysia, he is one of the pioneers practising Anti-Aging Medicine and Holistic Integrated Medicine (combining modern, natural and complementary therapies); and in promoting Natural HRT for Menopause in Malaysian women. In the last 5 years he has turned his expertise to Medical Aesthetics, Medical Slimming therapies and Aesthetic Surgery. He is also certified in Stem Cell Therapy and Laser Slimming Therapy. 

Although trained in Modern Medicine (practicing Obstetrics/Gynecology, Family Practice, Anti-Aging and Aesthetic Medicine), he is a firm believer and practitioner of Holistic Health, Alternative/Complementary Therapies, Energy Medicine, Integrated Medicine, Predictive and Preventive Medicine, Energy, Nutritional Healing and Spiritual Healing. 

He was the Founding President of Guolin Qigong Association Malaysia and was also the Vice-President of the Malaysian Reiki Association. He has been practising and teaching Qigong (Islamic, Guolin, Xiangong and Shaolin Qigong) nearly 20 years, and is a respected Qigong Master and Reiki Master. 

He is also trained in Healing Tao, Hypnosis, Islamic Unani Medicine, Mind Science, Pranic Healing, Phytobiophysics, Psychic Healing, Silva Mind Control, Sufi Healing, and Kundalini Yoga. 

His areas of special interest include – Antioxidants & Free Radicals ; BioEnergetic Healing, Cancer Therapy; Cell/Placenta  Therapies;  Detoxification; Enzymes; Functional Foods; Raw Foods; Mind-Body Medicine; Oxygen and Ozone Therapies; and  Probiotics. 

He is a popular health columnist for The Star newspaper, writing on Qigong, Wellness, Nutrition and other Health topics. His “Art of Qi/Art of Healing” health column has been published fortnightly for over 5 years.
